description.index: Francesco Dulio - Building complex systems in ambiguous contexts. Working at the intersection of vision, decisions, and delivery.
description.family: Family - Francesco Dulio. What matters most.
description.insurance: Insurance Innovation - Francesco Dulio. Technology and Trust in Insurance.

title.church: My Journey in the Church - Francesco

index.heroOpening: Building complex systems in ambiguous contexts.
index.heroSupporting: I work at the intersection of vision, decisions, and delivery—where structure is missing and responsibility matters.
whatIWorkOnList: Multi-stakeholder systems where alignment isn't given
High ambiguity and variability—where playbooks don't exist
Decisions with real consequences, not theoretical exercises
Systems that need structure, not noise
index.whatIWorkOnExample: A concrete example of this is the Palio of Vigevano—an organizational ecology of institutions, associations, sponsors, volunteers, logistics, and real risk—where I lead vision and delivery under ambiguity.
howIWorkList: I take ownership of outcomes, not just tasks
I make decisions when information is incomplete
I build for durability, not demonstration
I say no to things that don't matter
index.signature:
Physics mindset.
Piano discipline.
Always asking why.
Building for passion, not noise.
index.familyText: Married to Sara, physiotherapist. Father of Chiara and Rachele. The center of everything.
index.palioText: President of the Palio of Vigevano since 2022. 50+ volunteers, 4 days of events, one historical race.
index.faithText: Catechist for teenagers in my parish. Sunday Mass, always.
index.elsewhereText: Alps in summer, classical piano since childhood, photography as observation.

family.heroSupporting: Married to Sara, physiotherapist. Father of Chiara and Rachele.
aboutUsList: Sara is a physiotherapist. We met at university. Together since 2011, married since 2017.
Chiara and Rachele are our daughters. Raising them is the most important project.
We live in Vigevano, the town where the Palio happens and where our community is rooted.
Faith, education, and presence are the values we try to live—not just talk about.
foundationList: Sunday is for family and Mass—no exceptions
Vacations in the mountains: hiking, silence, disconnect
Decisions made together, even the hard ones

palioPage.heroSupporting: A large-scale historical event operating in a non-hierarchical environment where vision and delivery must coexist.
theSystemList: Municipality, Province, local foundations—each with its own timeline and priorities
10+ sponsors to coordinate, from local businesses to institutional partners
50+ volunteers across logistics, communication, historical accuracy, safety
4 days of events, one historical horse race, 10,000+ visitors over the weekend
myRoleList: President since 2022. I'm responsible for the event happening—period.
I run weekly coordination meetings from March to October
I manage relationships with institutions, negotiate with sponsors, resolve conflicts
When something goes wrong during the event, I'm the one who decides—on the spot
palioPage.signature:
Real logistical risk.
Real organizational complexity.
Real public exposure.
Leadership without formal authority.

insurance.heroSupporting: Insurance is trust translated into systems. I work on bridging traditional values with modern tools—making protection more accessible without losing what matters.
myApproachList: Traditional protection values combined with innovative technology
Making insurance more accessible and understandable
Building efficient digital solutions that serve real needs
Putting transparency at the center of every interaction
techIntegrationList: AI-driven risk assessment for better accuracy
Digital claims processing that respects people's time
Smart contract implementation for transparent agreements
Data analytics that improves coverage, not just profits
insurance.signature:
Personalized solutions.
Transparent communication.
Continuous support.
Protection that evolves with life.
lookingAheadList: Digital innovation that serves human needs
Process automation without losing the personal touch
Customer experience that builds trust over time
Risk management that adapts to a changing world

entrepreneurship.heroSupporting: Entrepreneurship is about creating meaningful impact in spaces where others see only problems. I focus on technology that solves real needs, not just theoretical ones.
stayActiveList: Building systems that last beyond the hype
howIBuildList: Creating sustainable solutions, not quick fixes
Building strong teams with shared values
Driving change that matters, not just change
entrepreneurship.signature:
Data-driven decisions.
Agile methodology.
Customer-centric approach.
Continuous innovation without noise.
teamPhilosophyList: Shared vision and values as the foundation
Continuous learning as a way of working

software.heroOpening: Code as a means, not an end.
software.heroSupporting: I write software to solve real problems—automating what's tedious, connecting what's fragmented, and building what doesn't exist yet.
philosophyList: Solving real-world problems, not theoretical exercises
techStackList: Python for automation and machine learning
AI and ML frameworks for intelligent solutions
software.signature:
Process automation.
AI integration.
Workflow optimization.
Systems that work while you sleep.
whatIBuildList: Custom automation solutions for complex workflows
AI-powered applications that learn and adapt
Digital transformation tools for traditional industries
Integration systems that connect disparate platforms

finance.heroSupporting: Finance is where risk meets opportunity. I approach markets with analytical rigor, technological tools, and a long-term perspective that looks beyond daily noise.
financialMarketsList: Traditional analysis enhanced with modern technology
Exploring new opportunities with careful evaluation
finance.signature:
AI-driven analysis.
Systematic approaches.
Risk-aware decisions.
Long-term thinking in short-term markets.
riskManagementList: Long-term planning with flexibility built in

church.heroSupporting: The Church is where I find purpose beyond work. I'm committed to bringing traditional values into contemporary contexts—making faith accessible without diluting what matters.
myRoleList: Catechist for young people (12-24 years) in my parish since 2015
Weekly meetings with a group of about 15 young people
Part of the pastoral council for youth ministry
Sunday Mass is non-negotiable—it's where the week begins
youthEducationList: We read scripture and discuss what it means for their lives—not abstract theology
We talk about real questions: relationships, doubt, meaning, choices
We organize retreats, service projects, and moments of reflection
I listen more than I teach. Their questions are often better than my answers.
church.signature:
Digital pastoral innovation.
Faith and technology connected.
Community engagement online and offline.
Change from within, not from outside.
visionForChangeList: Evolving the Church from within, respectfully
Maintaining core values while adapting methods
Communication that speaks to today's world

projects.heroSupporting: This page is not a portfolio of experiments.
projects.title: Projects
projects.introLine1: It’s a selection of real systems I have built, led, or contributed to,
projects.introLine2: in contexts where ambiguity, responsibility, and real-world consequences were present.
currentFocusList: Decisions carry operational, reputational, or economic weight
Long-term sustainability matters more than short-term visibility
projects.palioIntro: A large-scale historical and cultural event with strong public exposure, operating in a non-hierarchical and highly variable environment.
projects.palioContext: The context includes real logistical, organizational, and reputational risk.
palioRoleList: Take responsibility where formal structure is missing
Enable coordination across very different actors
Ensure continuity and reliability year after year
projects.palioClosing: This is an example of leadership without formal authority, applied at real scale.
projects.stayActiveIntro: StayActive was a startup operating at the intersection of technology, health, and behavioral change.
projects.stayActiveClosed: The project is now closed, but it remains a formative experience.
stayActiveRoleList: To execution, partnerships, and external positioning
projects.stayActiveClosing: StayActive shaped how I approach system design, decision-making under pressure, and the cost of real-world constraints.
projects.healthcareIntro: Consulting work at the intersection of software and healthcare, supporting clinical and rehabilitation workflows.
healthcareFocusList: Translating complex clinical needs into usable systems
Reliability in contexts where trust and accuracy are critical
projects.healthcareClosing: This work reinforced a system-oriented approach in environments where errors have real consequences.
projects.insuranceIntro: Ongoing involvement in insurance and financial organizations facing structural and technological transition.
insuranceWorkList: Redesigning processes where legacy structures no longer scale
Introducing automation and digital tools responsibly
Supporting decision-making in contexts with economic exposure
projects.insuranceClosing: The emphasis is always on making systems work, not just making them modern.
projects.communityIntro: Design and support of digital initiatives within community and faith-based environments.
communitySystemsList: Under strong ethical and relational constraints
projects.communityClosing: They provide a different but valuable perspective on coordination, trust, and long-term engagement.
projects.connectIntro: Across very different domains, the pattern is consistent:
connectList: Structure must often be built while moving
Systems must work with real people, not ideal ones
projects.connectClosing: That’s where I tend to operate best.
projects.githubIntro: Public repositories updated directly from my GitHub profile.
